lip

sentences.english: I'm not going to waste any more words on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 我不想在这个问题上多费唇舌了。

sentences.english: It‘s no use talking to him , you‘ll only waste your breath.
sentences.chinese: 和谈谈话没有一点用处，你只是在白费唇舌。
